articles.author: Hanna Park, Taylor Romine
articles.title: Shooting at Indiana supermarket leaves two people dead and two officers injured - CNN
articles.description: Two people were killed and two police officers were injured in a shooting Monday evening at a supermarket in northern Indiana, police said.
articles.content:
Two people were killed and two police officers were injured in a shooting Monday evening at a supermarket in northern Indiana, police said.
The shooter died in a confrontation with police, officials… [+2960 chars]
